property.name: Rules
property.value: Etrata, the Silencer can't be blocked. Whenever Etrata deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls and put a hit counter on that card. That player loses the game if they own three or more exiled cards with hit counters on them. Etrata's owner shuffles Etrata into their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Allow me a moment to catch your breath."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Netherborn Phalanx enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar." - Aszala of House Dimir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Circu, Dimir Lobotomist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target sorcery spell. • Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. • Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits." - Sign outside Dinrova Building

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir." - Szadek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal four land cards, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii" - Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If Szadek, Lord of Secrets would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul seek unbounded strength. The Dimir deliver cruel irony.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't so much hire goblins as put ideas in their heads.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards they've drawn this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet brains and Izzet boilers: contents under pressure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UR} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!" - Trivaz, Izzet mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive." - Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Draw X cards. • Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {2}{U}{R}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only action worth taking is one with an unknown outcome."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tracing the horizon in a dance of wind and fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1. // Burn deals 2 damage to any target.
Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Undergrowth - When Izoni, Thousand-Eyed enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard. {B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The outskirts of Golgari territory are guarded by more than just walls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After fear and weakness rot away, that which remains is stronger than its living form.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Golgari insects live for centuries - and they never stop growing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B}. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, mill ten cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. Mill four cards, then that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each land card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rot farmer's first rite of passage is to craft a pair of work stilts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Golgari reclaimers resent the gorgons, begrudging the loss of so many fine nutrients locked away in stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. • Destroy target enchantment. • Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity." - Jarad

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Grave-Shell Scarab: Draw a card. Dredge 1 (If you would draw a card, you may mill a card instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}{G}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken creature: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lotleth Troll. {B}: Regenerate Lotleth Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He lurks in the undercity, eager for the corpse haulers to unload their rotting cargo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process." - Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's most raw beauty is the circle: perfect in its continuance, with no break between death and life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Shambling Shell: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gorgons crave beautiful things: gems, exquisite amulets, the alabaster corpses of the petrified dead . . .

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, haste Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader." - Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Battalion - Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Agrus Kos, Wojek Veteran attacks, attacking red creatures get +2/+0 and attacking white creatures get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lieutenant Kos has never met a group of recruits he could not inspire or a mob he could not quell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. • Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to any target. {RW}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Radiance - Brightflame deals X damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the pyres of the unbelievers light our way." - Razia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Battalion - Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, Boros tactics are unparalleled. But when your comrades are dying around you, inner strength must carry the day." - Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only before attackers are declared. You choose which creatures attack this turn. You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, haste {T}: The next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control this turn is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her sword burns with such brightness that foes avert their eyes and arrows divert their paths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, lifelink, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{R}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sunhome - the stalwart shield, the towering sentinel, the seat of justice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. {1}{G}{W}, {T}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are no soloists in the chorus of Selesnya.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy all nontoken creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity." - Niszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one in the Conclave acts alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will defend the Worldsoul from Izzet ‘progress' at any cost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will grow an army large enough to withstand the Izzet's madness." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({GW} can be paid with either {G} or {W}.) Other permanents you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We in the Conclave have a saying: ‘When you hold a shield, lend your shield.' The strong must never forget what they owe to the weak." - Niszka, Selesnya evangel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. • Exile target creature with power 5 or greater. • Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clamor of the city drowns all voices. But together we can sing a harmony that will resonate from Ravnica's tallest spires to her deepest wells."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade." - Trostani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Create Voja, a legendary 2/2 green and white Wolf creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{G}{W}, {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control, Sacrifice Grove of the Guardian: Create an 8/8 green and white Elemental creature token with vigilance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W}.
